description: Provides useful helper methods for implementing MsBuild Tasks.
releaseNotes:
[234] Add unit tests for MsBuild tasks (pvandervelde)
[235] The GitBranchExpected and GitRevNoExpected properties are overwritten (pvandervelde)
[236] Getting the issue IDs from the current branch fails if the target branch doesn't exist as local branch (pvandervelde)
[237] Allow user to specify the search expression when generating files (pvandervelde)
[238] Provide IL merging capabilities (pvandervelde)
[239] ILMerge task should use better name for KeyFile (pvandervelde)
[240] FxCop report overwrites report with the same framework version (pvandervelde)
[241] FxCop should allow custom dictionaries per item in the list (pvandervelde)
[242] Build executes too many instances of the initialization of template tokens (pvandervelde)
[243] Make default property values work better (pvandervelde)
[244] Release note template tokens should always be written (pvandervelde)
[245] MsBuild invocation tasks should pass properties on the commandline (pvandervelde)
[246] Executing based on groups fails because step groups aren't parsed correctly (pvandervelde)
[249] Build solution step should fail if there are no solutions to build (pvandervelde)
[250] ILMerge tries to merge the primary assembly into itself (pvandervelde)
[251] When dynamically creating item group split the exclude and include parts (pvandervelde)
[252] Run individual steps in the original MsBuild instance (pvandervelde)
[253] Create library with base MsBuild task functions (pvandervelde)
[255] Script to copy files from NuGet packages (pvandervelde)
[256] Targets file should have unique properties (pvandervelde)
[257] FxCop reports may overwrite if there are multiple targeting the same framework (pvandervelde)
[258] Support Visual Studio 2017 and MsBuild 15.0 (pvandervelde)
[259] Bootstrapping fails if there are project dependencies (pvandervelde)
[260] Step properties may have semi-colon at end if there is only one property value (pvandervelde)
[261] Support NuGet package expansion without version numbers in the path (pvandervelde)
[262] NuGet install should allow not having the version number in the path (pvandervelde)
[265] Copying files from a NuGet package with a directory wildcard creates incorrect destination path (pvandervelde)
[266] Provide pre- and post-import scripts for the build server settings (pvandervelde)
[267] ItemGroup items should have condition that prevents a global select all (pvandervelde)
[268] The regular expressions used to determine feature, hotfix and release branches are not restrictive enough (pvandervelde)
